name: Chillfest Republic
overview:
The Chillfest Republic is an online collaborative guide for travel.

When you travel you read the guidebook before you get somewhere to find out what you should do, where to stay, how to get there. But once you get there, you always meet people who know a better place to stay, a better way to get there and a better thing to do tonight in this town.

We are a nation of travelers looking share this knowledge in the pursuit of â€œshare.live.chillâ€

Any question you ask, chances are someone has asked it before, and someone out there will have the answer. Find it here.

About the Chillfest Republic:

Definition of Chillfest Chillfest / CH il fest / noun. (pl. â€“s) A term used to describe a cool, fun, awesome, life changing experience had by travellers. Usually relating to a specific location with lifelong friends.

Motto o share knowledge o live the experience o find your own Chillfest SHARE.LIVE.CHILL

As a member of The Chillfest Republicâ€¦ â€¦you can create an account to become a member of the Chillfest Republic, log on to the site and start sharing information by creating posts which are sorted into the relevant categories based on entry fields.

The accuracy of your posts are maintained organically by a voting system: Good advice will get good votes and move up the ranking; in the same way, bad advice will move down the rankings and eventually be removed. You can also upload pictures of your travels.
